Reviews.Title: Real review of a great phone compared to 5s!
Reviews.Author: Whitecraine
Reviews.Content: I got my phone through T-mobile's deal of $0 down and pay over 2 years. It's my first iphone switching from andriod. At first I was worried about missing out on the 5s features and that it would be quite small compared to HTC One and other Samsung phones, but I think it is the right size for convenient single hand usage. A bigger screen may be welcome in the future for better movies/gameplay/document viewing but it's certainly better than the 4s screen size.I finally went to an Apple store to see the 5s that I "missed out" on. I found out I actually preferred the 5c to the 5s because of how comfortable it felt in hand and the slight additional weight of the 5c made it feel more substantial and durable. The 5s was also less comfortable to hold due to the sharp edges and felt "cheap" because of how light it was. I was also kind of turned off by how the 5s looks after being used for so long - the demo models were a bit scratched/grimy not very bright/shinny/attractive. On the other hand the 5c "ages" well. I also tested responsiveness and speed of the user interface and was not impressed. It was exactly the same as the 5c. Probably larger apps and other computation would load faster, but general things like scrolling through menus, opening webpages was no different. Next time I'll have to try something more graphics intensive and report back but it does say a lot about the 5c.Functionality, speed and ergonomics are all there with the 5c. Another thing worth mentioning is that the 5c is the less "flashy" phone and that was important to me (at least the white version) since I am not looking to standout and since there are a lot of phone theft/muggings/robberies these days. So overall, I feel this phone fit my needs perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great iDevice
Reviews.Author: Arthur J. Heller
Reviews.Content: I've always had relatively inexpensive smartphones, Blackberry knockoffs (the Alcatel things) and so on. Most of them had data access, but it most were rudimentary at best. I kept an iPod Touch around as an iOS device, and used it to take most of the pictures that I wanted to post on Facebook or wherever because the cameras in my phones were usually awful. Recently updated from an $80 Android device to an iPhone 5c, as the store was out of the 5s.That said... the 5c is a solid, solid phone. It is identical, hardware-wise, to the iPhone 5, except that it's made out of plastic and has a better front-side camera (1.2 megapixels vs VGA). It is quick, and runs a huge variety of apps. The battery life is fantastic. I haven't had any difficulty getting data even when in the middle of nowhere, or wandering around the unexplored wastes of the New Jersey pine barrens. Voice control is a plus... though Siri is, er, interesting, the real benefit is being able to tell the phone "Call mom" or "Call laura" or something while you're driving, so you don't have to be fiddling around with buttons. Texting works the same way, you can tell it to "Text Mom" and then say the message and send it. Very cool, convenient features to have.The plastic feels very good. I've heard reviews that said it felt cheap compared to the "real" iPhone, but in reality the plastic -- or, I'm sorry, polycarbonate -- is really strong and is far less prone to scratching and chipping than the glass or metal versions are. The physical buttons on the side are functional and feel responsive, even moreso than on the 4s or iPhone 5. The main camera takes amazing photos, has HDR functionality, and takes beautiful, 1080p, video.The downside to the phone is the standard iPhone complaints. Namely, there's a lack of "openness", in that I have no access to the basic filesystem, and that anything I want on the phone has to be shunted through iTunes, including ringtones: I had to take an MP3 file of the sound I wanted, add it to iTunes, then convert it to a ringtone just to make it available in the "Tones" list, and THEN I could sync it to the phone. Likewise, it wants you to get all your pictures and stuff off either through iCloud or with iPhoto, but I use a third party piece of software that lets me access the device directly.Another complaint I have is that, for contacts, it synced to the address book on my MacBook Pro... which is all fine and well, but then it also scraped through my Facebook account for information, which then left me with a bunch of people that I either never want to get in touch with, or double entries for those I do. Scrounging through my phone to try to find one person amongst a list of like 400, both contact and Facebook friend, is annoying at best.

Reviews.Title: Great phone. Great price.
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Fabrizio Jr. "Tech Geek"
Reviews.Content: I wanna address some of other peoples reviews on this product, especially the guy that said unlocked phones don't exist on apple anymore.Apple sells unlocked phones directly from their factory for GSM carriers. You're an idiot. Plain and simple. I don't even know how your review got posted, all of the negative reviews here don't add to the listing at all. Keep your ignorance to yourself.Anyways onto the review.I've had the phone for about a month now, I wanted to get the 5S and was saving for it but my 4S was stolen and so obviously I needed a phone fast.So I guess I'll list the pros and cons over my 4S.Pros:1.Cheaper at 99 dollars with a two year contract locked to a carrier.2. Nice color.3. Bigger screen is much welcomed.4. Faster chipset with the A6 chip is great.5. Camera is absolutely awesome.6. Battery life is great. After all day with my phone. I still had a half of battery left. Which is pretty good for a smartphone.Cons:1. Plastic construction may be a vulnerability and doesn't look as elegant.2. Accessory support really is limited for this phone. Which is heavily disappointing. Every accessory fits only the 5 and 5s. So be advised not many cases are out for this phone.In my opinion this is a great phone replacement for someone who wants an iphone but at a cheaper price. But if you have the money, I'd go with the 5S. Just because of the lack or accessory support for the 5C.EDIT 10/30/13: a commenter (Chow) mentioned that my review contains material from the carrier locked phone. And that it's widely unhelpful. At this point I would like to mention that the carrier locked phone and the unlocked phone are the EXACT same device. With the EXACT same functionality. The only difference being that one is unlocked to all GSM chipset carriers rather than being restricted to one. So even though I wrote the review on the fact that I own the carrier locked version, all the points stated in my review still are valid other than the change in price between the two.  Apple iPhones have the same basic components and same software regardless if they are carrier locked or not.-Tom-

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons of 5c
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: Overall the product is great.But here are some pros and cons.PRO'S1. Affordable2. Great colors3. Camera takes nice pictures4. Battery lasts a long time5. Has A6 chip which is great for what you are spending. CON'S1. Made from plastic2. Looks a little child like3. Not very elegant The 5c is overall a great phone for a person who wants a smartphone and does not want to spend to much money.

Reviews.Title: My friend has the new iPhone 5s which is said to be better that the 5c
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: I am reviewing the green iPhone c, which I currently just got a couple weeks ago. I got mine from Verizon for $150.00 with a two year contract. This phone doesn’t compare to any other phone I have ever had, I’m going to talk about how this phone compares to no other phone I have ever had and why it is so different. I’m going to explain that you can have the next new item with apple and not have to spend one whole check on the phone.My friend has the new iPhone 5s which is said to be better that the 5c, but there really isn’t a difference besides the touch to open. That is pretty cool but the 5c doesn’t everything exactly the same at one fourth the price. This is a great product for if you want to have the new hot item for not a lot of money, which who has $600 to throw around for the next big thing with apple. I really like how it is light weight and has a really clear screen, I feel like I am getting everything my phone can offer with having a screen that is big. As soon as I found out they had an iPhone is green I had to have one, it is my favorite color and it is so adorable. Green is my favorite color and it is not an ugly green like you are thinking.The down part about this phone is it is cheap, yes it is made out of plastic but you are going to put a case on it anyways why pay so much for a phone that you will just cover up any ways. If it is so cheap why do people keep buy it and it isn’t cheap just the back of the phone is cheap with its plastic back that is in all those pastel colors. I hate how they made one case that shows they back but it isn’t a really sturdy case so if you wanted a heavy duty case you would have to cover they color of your phone which is the main reason you wanted the colored iPhone. It is still soon they could still make more cases; that will show the back of the phone with its pretty colors.I have always had an android but my last one was the last straw, because everyone I know who has an android always has a problem eventually. Everyone I know that has a iPhone even if it’s an old iPhone they still work and have little to no problems. It all depends on how you take care of your phone. I hate when people say android is better oh but my phone can do this and this and this, but all phones do something different so you android lovers get over yourselves and realize that everyone phone is its own phone they can all do something cool and different. The battery life on the iPhone 5c is amazing I can be on my apps all day and still have battery life, my last phone I would open an app and my phone would go down to 50%. Apple isn’t perfect but they do have some really cool items and this happens to be one of them.This is the perfect phone for anyone who doesn’t want to spend a lot of money and wants to have the next new item with apple that is my advice to you. It is a great phone with the speed of the processor, the size of the screen, and most of all the battery life on the phone. It really is a great phone I would recommend it to anyone who has always wanted an apple phone and couldn’t afford it.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy S4, HTC One or Iphone 5c? Just Iphone!
Reviews.Author: Liub
Reviews.Content: Buy the iphone 5c, you won't be dissapointed! Perfect design, excellent audio, minimialist look and just solid.And the best...Drop the S4 = Bye bye 500$Drop the HTC = Hello scratchesDrop the 5c = ... , did it fall?

Reviews.Title: nothing wrong
Reviews.Author: D. A. WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: I upgraded my iphone 4 for a  iPhone 5c it was time  the i4 was slowing down and the 5c has a a5 processor. A step up from my i4''s a4; I have Bluetooth in my car and it works great. My i4 would cut out after I did the ISO7 update. I own other apple products as well iPad 2 and and older iPod nano 3 gen. I see no issue with these phones, more to the point most people do not like plastic. Hmm both plastic or metal one will dent and the other will crack if you drop it without a case on it, as will glass on the back side of the s5 will crack as will the front. Some reviews of the made me laugh since they state that this phone it a ripoff but if you buy any unlocked phone it will cost you more. When you buy a plan some of the reviewers I guess are clueless what pays for the phone over the two years which cost less up front. I never do that. I been with Verizon since I had a cell phone back before apple even invented the iPhone. and guess what it was plastic not metal.  Never have a dropped call unless I am on the road and hardly ever happens. I did not buy a unlocked phone.  I got mine for 7.50 I traded my iphone 4 in and got a $50 off, which was the price of the phone. I feel that I do not need to spend the extra $150.00 for the metal one since it is basically the same phone in plastic which cost less to manufacture than the metal that is why apple did this in the first place.  If you do not like plastic go though you house and throw it all away than. Here is a hint the fuzzy throw Blankets or pull overs called polyester They are made of recycled plastic soda bottles but they are so warm.UpdateStill acts like an iPhone though faster data when searching the web with the LTE with a small cost of battery life but I had so much trouble with searching on the iphone4 on 3G that I will not miss that. just really look at your notifications on you phone that take more battery power I shut what I did not need off.  If you leave the iphone 5 in the car and it is really cold outside. if you phone is off do not turn it on till you have it warm up in your house. this is a a safety feature of this phone. condensation can built up inside of the phone if you leave it in a cold place like a car in winter. The iPhone 5c or the 5s will turn itself off to protect it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPhone5C
Reviews.Author: Amphawan. Wong
Reviews.Content: I got one it was brand new and excellent thank you. I liked it very much. I hope you sell more.

Reviews.Title: not unlocked
Reviews.Author: GAPPPP
Reviews.Content: not only was locked but it was sprint the only operator that you cant unlock, guess i lost my money

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Jacs
Reviews.Content: This is honestly the best phone I've ever had. I remember before I got this people told me "ew your getting the 5C? They think of this phone as a super cheap iphone that's bound to break well, it's not. It's has a super fast processor and it feels durable in my hands. I bought the pink one which is actually more of a neon coral which I don't mind at all.  This phone is honestly the same as the 5 except for the plastic body. At a $100 cheaper than the 5s, this is definitely a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Upgrade experience from 4S to 5C
Reviews.Author: girlhood
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to the iPhone 5c from the iPhone 4S. Here is my review from the perspective of this specific upgrade.Pros:1. Bigger screen and true 16:9 ratio2. Better resolution3. Higher picture quality4. Look. Multiple color options.5. Faster processor = better browsing experienceCons:1. Look. Not es elegant as the classic iPhones.2. Material feels cheaper (plastic). But that can be helped by adding a case.Overall:The pros outweight the cons and the phone is much more affordable than the higher end S model. If you plan on regularly upgrading your phone (you don't need the top of the line phone if you plan on getting a new one in a few months) or are limited financially, this is a wonderful phone.It does everything the top model 5S does and costs less.

Reviews.Title: Not what it appears to be...
Reviews.Author: esym
Reviews.Content: This phone came in an Apple box, packed like new but with different (non-Apple) stickers.  And it was not new.  A check of the IMEI number revealed that the phone was about 9 months old, had been registered in China to China Mobile, and was set to operate on their network.Fortunately Amazon is great about returns so no harm done.

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Álvarez
Reviews.Content: Everything has resulted excellent...except for a problem I had with the forwarding company ... Absolutely out of the amazon and Green Apple issues...

Reviews.Title: First smartphone; attractive, easy to use, great battery life
Reviews.Author: abaugher
Reviews.Content: As one of those late-adapters, I held on to my old phone for a long, long time (5 years!), but I recently decided to join the masses and get a smartphone. I've always used Apple products - from the desktop computer our family had when I was a kid to my current laptop and iPod. Though I played around with Droids and the other brands in the store, I was pretty sure going in that I would want an iPhone.I initially thought about the iPhone 4s (which is about a dollar right now), but I didn't like the idea of being roped into a 2-year plan with older technology and poor battery life.My perspective on this product would best suit someone similar to me: you want to be able to do all the usual stuff (call/text, check e-mail/Facebook, Google maps, decent battery life, use a few apps, take pictures), but don't care if it's the most current or top-of-the-line product. My perspective doesn't match what tech critics think about this iPhone - namely that this was a huge mistake on Apple's part; however, this phone is basically what I was looking for.Pros:- $99 with a 2-year commitment. This is really up to you whether this is a good deal or not. I don't plan to update my phone every time new technology comes around - I also get a great deal with my family plan - so I didn't have a problem signing the 2-year contract with them.- Attractive colors- Lightweight- Intuitive interface. This was very important to me because I'm new to touchscreen interfaces and, in general, smartphone technology. This phone has been easy to use so far.- The battery life is great.- Fast wireless- For those of us who don't need the maximum storage capacity that the 5s offers, this seems like a good compromise between the slower iPhone 4s and the more expensive, top-of-the-line (for now) 5s.- Great camera! It takes nicer pictures than my actual camera.- Handy "find my phone" feature in the iCloud, that locates your iPhoneCons:- I don't know if this is true of all smartphones, or if it's just this one, but I think it's annoying that I can't rearrange the icons on the wallpaper. I'd like to put the icons I use most on the front and stick the ones I don't use on the back. Maybe I just need to fiddle with it more.- Like others have said, there is only one colored wallpaper pattern available (of course, you could put any picture you like). I don't really care, since it's an attractive blue-green ombre. If I get sick of it, I'll just replace it with a picture of my cat.- It does have less storage than the iPhone 5s, but it still has quite a bit more than previous generations.- I anticipate that the bright, saturated color will fade over time.

Reviews.Title: Lies!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dennisse
Reviews.Content: Before I start, one star is much greater than what this guy deserves.I brought this phone for my teenage sister. We have tmobile. The phone discription says unlocked but DOES NOT WORK ON SPRINT phones only on tmobile and AT&T;, Okay cool. I go to tmobile to buy a new charger because apparently the one he sent me is not iphone compatible and to cut my SIM card. The guy puts it in the phone and searches the serial number to find out not only is it not locked but also ONLY works on sprint networks.500$ and time WASTED. Still waiting on a reply by him to refund me every penny. Never had a problem with amazon until now.

Reviews.Title: I feel great about it
Reviews.Author: aya hegger
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my new cellular phone.  Nothing to compare with my previous one.  It is very user friendly, even for an older person like myself.  I enjoy the internet' reading and writing mails,  putting new apps and listening to music with the convenient and good quality earphones/  Happy I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Meh...It's ok
Reviews.Author: John O.
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to this phone from my iPhone 4 a few months ago. The phone is not really an upgrade from the iPhone 4 but not really a downgrade either.1st things 1st. Apple changed the charger for this phone so all of those previous chargers you have lying around your house won't work for this phone (unless you buy their adapter for a whopping $30). On top of that the battery drains really quickly. Even after you turn off all of those unnecessary apps.The phone is longer than the iPhone 4, but the same width. It slips out of your pocket very easily due to the slippery back. You definitely want to pick up a case for it as well. Other than that the apps are just as sleek and the camera is sufficiently better.Is it worth the hefty price tag? Not in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: It works but not sure about unused
Reviews.Author: James C. Reeves "Jim"
Reviews.Content: It was supposed to be new and unused but it had been opened and lots of smudges on the screen. It appears to be working properly.

Reviews.Title: They sent me an used item
Reviews.Author: Hariharasudhan
Reviews.Content: I asked for a new phone and they sent me an used mobile. This is cheating and i would like to raise a case in a court for this issue.

Reviews.Title: not unlocked
Reviews.Author: josh Fanti
Reviews.Content: phone was supposed to be unlocked but wasn't so then i had to go through the hassle of getting it unlocked without a contract with them, thanks...

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from this seller
Reviews.Author: said
Reviews.Content: I phone was not like new as the seller stated, the charger was not the original , the price was too high compare to the value of the phone

Reviews.Title: Sleek and Useful
Reviews.Author: prisrob "pris,"
Reviews.Content: For a woman in her late 60's, i wanted to upgrade from my iPhone 4, with a similar but newer phone.The iPhone5c is exactly what I wanted. I read all the reviews, and this one compared favorably in all aspects.This iPhone 5c is sleek and easy to use with one hand. The plastic casings come in various colors, which is fine, but not a major deal for me. Compared to other smart devices on the market the smartphone isn’t as powerful, but as it runs iOS 7 upgradable to iOS 7.1, I can run almost every application that I want. The 8MP camera featured on the iPhone 5c is the same one featured on the 5s, and it gives photos of decent quality. The camera has a ton of different modes to capture my life moments, including panorama and square photos. The  camera is still one of the best features and I can use videos. The battery of the Apple iPhone 5c lasts about 12 hours of normal usage.This is a great phone for me, and it is an excellent phone for me.Recommended. prisrob 05-05-14

Reviews.Title: excellent phone.
Reviews.Author: Mickey A.
Reviews.Content: I got this phone from a seller in Orlando Fl. I was sceptical at first since it didn't sound right to have a new iPhone without a retail box. When I called the seller he was courteous and helpful. He explained how he conducts his business and how he gets his phones cheap from the factory to then resell. The service is excellent and the phone is actually new and without any defects. It works perfectly. I recommend the item and the seller.

Reviews.Title: New phone
Reviews.Author: toine
Reviews.Content: Good as new, great. I'm happy with my new iPhone ����. I have no complaints at all. I'm So thankful

Reviews.Title: i dont liked
Reviews.Author: J. Fernando Paiva
Reviews.Content: I bought a factory unlocked iphone and I got one that is not.I am very dissatisfied with the product, it does not reside in the U.S. and can not use it. Careful not to be fooled.proved to ask the seller, but gave a different product advertised. Volunteered to receive the product by charging a small fee, but honestly did not trust.

Reviews.Title: Data sucking phone
Reviews.Author: M. M. Peterson
Reviews.Content: This phone SUCKS data like no other......I used 8gb the first month I had it!! I went back to the store and told them and to see why. The guy said there is no way you can use that much data unless your downloading movies and music. I showed him that I did none of that and I don't use it as much as my analog phone...he put in a trouble ticket.....This did nothing! They stated I'm using the data but cant show me where! I turn off cellular services and STILL go over.....I'd like to throw this phone against the wall.....Buyer beware....you'll be paying for data you dont use and it will cost you big bucks!! I have read this problem all over the internet. Why isn't something being done about it? Rip off

Reviews.Title: OFFERED AS UNLOCKED BUT WASN`T.
Reviews.Author: claudia
Reviews.Content: The IPhone I received is from AT&T;, NOT UNLOCKED as advertised. I bought it in the US and travelled back home in argentina with the IPhone, and tried to put a Movistar SIm Card, only then I realized it was not possible because the IPhone was NOT unlocked, it is from AT&T.; iI asked for a change, seller said have no more unlocked Iphones so he can`t change it, asked me to send the IPhone and THEN he will refund the money, because Amazon policies. I tried to unlock it here and it is not possible because AT&T; troubles with sistems. Then, I have a beautiful brand new unuseful blue AT&T; IPhone I didn't asked for, but already payed as a unlocked one. And have no possibility to return it up to april when I go to the US.- Silly me! I thought Amazon sellers would`t make such mistakes.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c versus Android Samsung Stratosphere II
Reviews.Author: Happy r/c
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Stratosphere II is a year old but now that a family member got an iPhone 5c, I can finally compare them.PROS:- iTunes music- most kids like to use FaceTime for videophone rather than Skype even though it's universal- Battery life increased from 8 hours to 10 hours but it's nowhere close to Samsung's 17 hours.- Most gadgets for smartphones have software for iPhone before Androids.CONS:- Can't surf on websites that show videos in the Flash format which is used on most websites.- Can't create speeddial icons to quickly call people by pressing an icon.  Instead, there's the clunky FAVORITES or use Siri (and wait for it to think and hope that it heard you correctly especially while I'm driving with the windows open creating sound interference)- The front of the phone doesn't have a place for me to leave a message like "If found, call 123-4567" so that someone can return it to me.- Retina screen is not as good as Samsung.  Samsung saves the #1 omoled screen technology for itself and sells #2 retina screens to Apple.- Can't easily copy files from pc to phone but have to go through iTunes and even that is limited to only a few types of files.  In other words, I can't use the iPhone as a $5 USB flash drive.- Glass screen is fragile compared to plastic android screen.- Because the screen is fragile, I have to buy a case for it which now makes it thicker and won't fit in phone holsters.- Lighting cord is stupid because I can't attach it to my car so that I can control via the car's head unit, docking stations, etc.- Can't install wifi hotspot software without paying monthly charges via phone carrier.- Can't have an extra battery or bigger battery (android phones can have bigger batteries up to 40 hours)- New battery replacements must be done by Apple at $130 whereas android batteries are $3 on Amazon and I can change a battery myself.- With an iPhone, I am without a phone while I send my phone out for a new battery.- Virtual keyboard does not have haptic feedback- No NFC chip to allow me to tap another phone to share/send a contact card or photos.- Virtual keyboard still not as good as physical keyboard, especially when it guesses what you're typing and misses the mark.- Can't expand the memory by buying a $10 micro SD card.- Apple tried to copy Android's alerts and notifications of new email, etc. but Android's multiple alerts and the ability to dismiss them is still better.- Android has google maps turn-by-turn GPS navigation but iPhone doesn't.- Customization: iPhone doesn't let me delete some apps I don't want to see whereas Android gives me complete control of keeping or deleting any app.  In other words, Android lets me customize so much that I don't need to root it like Apple iPhone.- iPhone doesn't have widgets.  For example, I have a TO DO list widget and I can resize the window.- iPhone can't install apps remotely to my phone like Android's Google Play Store.  This is a convenience and not a big deal.- voice-to-text dictation app is not free.  Often when I'm driving, I want to record a reminder to myself.- can't print to my wireless printer like Samsung using Cloud Print

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Ximena Hakim
Reviews.Content: No, it did not. It said it was unlocked while actually it was carrier locked. Ive had so many problems with it since I do not live in united states. The green back side of the phone is horribly scratched, and it looks like a teeth or someone used to bit the phone, therefore, there are teeth marks.

Reviews.Title: mediocre phone
Reviews.Author: PenName25
Reviews.Content: Performance: From what I have read, the 5c is essentially the same as the iphone 5 except for the following: slightly wider and heavier with a plastic instead of metal body, slightly better front facing camera,  and slightly improved battery life.Also there is no Siri. iOS7 looks nice and is a much needed update to the iOS world. As an otherwise all android person I definitely notice this phone is smoother and faster than my Android phone although the hardware is really not any better and not top of the line (the iphone 5s blows it away and this hardware is basically from the 2012 iphone 5). That makes me appreciate the OS and apps and the overall refinement of the software on iphones.Design: The plastic though is slippery and even though Apple Nation likes to call it high quality polycarbonate even though it is just "cheap plastic" on Samsung phones, don't be fooled because this is just cheap plastic as well. Also, the colors are a bit lame for guys. I had to default to white since the rest are a bit feminine. I also find lame that Apple liked the buzz phrase of integrating hardware and software with this phone. This seems to just be a fancy way of saying if you buy a white phone white wallpaper and if you buy a blue phone you are stuck with a blue wallpaper. iOS 7 also integrates the new colors of the phones but I don't find anything innovative about that. The iphone still has a screen that easliy cracks. I dropped my phone from about 4 feet in a $50 retail protective case and it still cracked the screen around the edges - I have never cracked another phone's screen in my life and this cracked within 1 month and in a high end screen.Software: As mentioned above, Apple has the best software that provides a smooth and fast experience and apps look better on this than they did no Android even with more powerful phones. I am already noticing though you have to sacrifice customization since Apple does not let you change nearly as much and clearly likes there products to be used their way. For now it is a nice change of pace, but it could get old if.Value: Terrible value, I only bought this because of a great sale and wanted to try Apple. This phone was made to kill off the iphone 5 to allow Apple to sell a phone with better margins and easier manufacturing via a plastic case and yet they kept the price high for a "new" product that basically came out in 2012. There is no siri, and it is the largest and heaviest of the iphone 5 series.Pros: overall decent phone, iOS 7 is nice and software is smooth, camera is good, has a lot of good accessories since it is a big name phoneCons: very overpriced for what you get, plastic body is cheap and slippery, no siri, great resolution but 4 inches is beginning to look small on phones, larger and heavier than the other 5 models, iphone is still very prone to cracking/shattering screen, nothing really new: this product was created to improve Apple's business strategy and not out of innovation, anyone who buys this is overpaying so Apple can keep margins healthy for investors. This product is proof of investors' recent concern of Apple's future.

Reviews.Title: mediocre phone
Reviews.Author: PenName25
Reviews.Content: Performance: From what I have read, the 5c is essentially the same as the iphone 5 except for the following: slightly wider and heavier with a plastic instead of metal body, slightly better front facing camera,  and slightly improved battery life.Also there is no Siri. iOS7 looks nice and is a much needed update to the iOS world. As an otherwise all android person I definitely notice this phone is smoother and faster than my Android phone although the hardware is really not any better and not top of the line (the iphone 5s blows it away and this hardware is basically from the 2012 iphone 5). That makes me appreciate the OS and apps and the overall refinement of the software on iphones.Design: The plastic though is slippery and even though Apple Nation likes to call it high quality polycarbonate even though it is just "cheap plastic" on Samsung phones, don't be fooled because this is just cheap plastic as well. Also, the colors are a bit lame for guys. I had to default to white since the rest are a bit feminine. I also find lame that Apple liked the buzz phrase of integrating hardware and software with this phone. This seems to just be a fancy way of saying if you buy a white phone white wallpaper and if you buy a blue phone you are stuck with a blue wallpaper. iOS 7 also integrates the new colors of the phones but I don't find anything innovative about that. The iphone still has a screen that easliy cracks. I dropped my phone from about 4 feet in a $50 retail protective case and it still cracked the screen around the edges - I have never cracked another phone's screen in my life and this cracked within 1 month and in a high end screen.Software: As mentioned above, Apple has the best software that provides a smooth and fast experience and apps look better on this than they did no Android even with more powerful phones. I am already noticing though you have to sacrifice customization since Apple does not let you change nearly as much and clearly likes there products to be used their way. For now it is a nice change of pace, but it could get old if.Value: Terrible value, I only bought this because of a great sale and wanted to try Apple. This phone was made to kill off the iphone 5 to allow Apple to sell a phone with better margins and easier manufacturing via a plastic case and yet they kept the price high for a "new" product that basically came out in 2012. There is no siri, and it is the largest and heaviest of the iphone 5 series.Pros: overall decent phone, iOS 7 is nice and software is smooth, camera is good, has a lot of good accessories since it is a big name phoneCons: very overpriced for what you get, plastic body is cheap and slippery, no siri, great resolution but 4 inches is beginning to look small on phones, larger and heavier than the other 5 models, iphone is still very prone to cracking/shattering screen, nothing really new: this product was created to improve Apple's business strategy and not out of innovation, anyone who buys this is overpaying so Apple can keep margins healthy for investors. This product is proof of investors' recent concern of Apple's future.

Reviews.Title: For those who like Colors
Reviews.Author: Vijay Joshi "Vijay"
Reviews.Content: I bought a White color so that I can go with multiple case colors to use throughout.... I am happy with the quality provided by Apple on the Plastic body.... I was using an Iphone 5 for a year when I choose to upgrade to 5C instead of an expensive 5S just coz of the colors and not going for a total hardware upgrade on 5S...I am happy with the phones look and performance being as good as 5 however the battery seems to have been enhanced in comparison to 5...

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5C
Reviews.Author: Debra Beaulieu
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting one for a while. I still was on my IPhone 3, I finally decided it was about time. I have only had it for a few weeks but I love it.

Reviews.Title: Long Battery Life
Reviews.Author: M Spaulding
Reviews.Content: I am alway sone model behind because I'm conservative.  I had a 3 GS and moved up to accommodate a special app for my truck.  Glad I did.  Real long battery life, IOS7 (which has updated 3 times for bugs) and a larger screen.  My only complaint about larger screens is its harder to apply screen savers.  I used to use ANdroid burt my phone frequently rebooted and Android phones limit the number of software upgrades to entice you to buy a new phone.  Apple provided full software upgrades to my 3GS until 7 came out.  As far as regular conversation goes I don't see a lot of difference between Apple and the better androids.  Many more apps for android, but a lot of them duplicate functions.  The 2 apps I miss most are the SWYPE keyboard and a YouTube downloader.  I found away around the YouTube issue but not the keyboard.  Why Apple refuses to put a row of numbers at the top of the keypad like a real keyboard is beyond me.  Overall I find the IOS platform more stable but more expensive and no difference in voice quality.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Solano
Reviews.Content: This phone feels strongly built. I bought this for my little sister (well she is 13) because I know how strong polycarbonate is. And it looks great in gray.

Reviews.Title: Everythis was perfect!
Reviews.Author: Francia
Reviews.Content: My cellphone works perfectly here in Venezuela, I recommend them 100%. My cellphone came complete and have all the accessories. I'm so happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: yalesyao
Reviews.Content: the quality is pretty good. and there is an extra earphone. and the phone is available for international use. and the color is good as well.

Reviews.Title: love my pink iphone
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: I choose 5 star because pone is excelent for me and for what I want. It's fast and color is beauty! nothing dislike

Reviews.Title: Good conditons
Reviews.Author: Roshina Font
Reviews.Content: Great conditions, apart from a broken piece of the container of the iphone, everything good. It's a great device! Never been and never will be disappointed by apple

Reviews.Title: incredible phone
Reviews.Author: sawsan
Reviews.Content: As a graphic design student, I found so much to love about this phone. I switched over from Android, and boy oh boy, I am never going back. I bought the 5c mainly because it was cheaper than the 5s, and the 5c had a much better feel to it. I'm a student with a limited budget, and the extra 100$ is a lot to me. But honestly, even if I had the cash I'm not sure I would buy the 5s. The 5c is slender, light, and beautiful; the colors make the phone feel unique and full of life. Having handled a 5s, I much prefer the 5c. Something about it seems more human, more playful, more unique. The phone feels as if it wants to be in your hand, and aesthetically speaking its quite beautiful. Coming from android, I found Apple to be a breath of fresh air. I don't believe there is a better designed phone on the market now--EVERYTHING about this phone has been considered, and it shows! Having a macbook, the interface of the 5c was familiar and great. The battery life on this phone is also incredible, lasting a day and then some on a single charge (I use apps that drained my last android phone in a matter of 3 hours!!). My only complaint, and this is important--- the plastic is fragile and bruises very very very easily. This may be why the phone feels much lighter and thinner, but honestly I do believe Apple could have handled this MUCH better. A single drop will result in a dent to the back of the phone if it is not handled with care. But you can solve this with a cover-- I highly recommend the cases made specifically for this phone by apple, DON'T BE FOOLED BY IMITATIONS--the Apple covers are worth it-- they create wonderful color combinations, have a fantastic gummy feel and are surprisingly protective. PLEASE, cover this Iphone, the screen included. It is such a fantastic phone that the soft plastic is excusable.

Reviews.Title: Love the I-Phone
Reviews.Author: J C
Reviews.Content: Love this I-Phone.  I bought it for my Girlfriend and she loves it and immediately bought a cheap SIM Card from Walmart, but it provides excellent service.  Pictures are clear, battery holds charge forever... basically what you would expect from an I-Phone 5C.

Reviews.Title: Love my iPhone!
Reviews.Author: Sandi Cleveland
Reviews.Content: I just love this phone.  It truly is my much adored iPad AND a phone.  It has really made my life much easier.

Reviews.Title: complete s***
Reviews.Author: ee
Reviews.Content: A useless device from Apple, terrible colour, not spectacular performance, outrageous price - good only for snobs and die-hard apple lovers

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: René Marelli
Reviews.Content: it's a greatr phone, but in Movistar in Venezuela doesn't work well. I like the phone, it works very well in wifi.

Reviews.Title: This is a masterpiece
Reviews.Author: Abdul M. Nuhu
Reviews.Content: It's the perfect thing I've ever had. It arrived on time and works awesome. My only concern with it it that it's camera is not as good as that of the samsung phones

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: PB
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife.  She loves it very much.  Easy and simple to use.  Party on Wayne

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Mohammed A.
Reviews.Content: Display is like no other.  I really like iphones and though this has slightly less features than the 5s, it still is a really high end smartphone.  The price was reasonable at the time of purchase.

Reviews.Title: Just as advertised
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in perfect conditions and work great! I had previous problems with another phone that was described as ''unlocked'' and didn't work, went throu a lot of problems because of that. But this one worked just fine! adn i was brand new, i'm using it in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Good phone but pricey without contract.
Reviews.Author: Solange
Reviews.Content: This phone is almost the same version with the iPhone 5 except the case is plastic which makes it cheaper but looks hippy or stylish. It's still has the iOS 7.1.1 version depending when you upgrades or download those versions. Quality photos takes great pictures and works well on pre installed social Apps . The only different from 5s version is that this phone doesn't have a finger print otherwise it's a good value and color wise it's your preference.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: Pros:Excellent build quality, iOS 7 rocks, A6 still a very decent setup, Better sharing options, Improved Camera UI, Better battery lifeCons:Display is still 4-inches and the iPhone 5C is not quite as cheap as we were hopingVerdict:Taking everything that made the iPhone 5 great and adding in a few more bells and whistles. The iPhone 5C is not the iPhone 5S, but it’s still a great little handset in its own right. Should prices come down –– which they inevitably will –– this handset could become very, very, popular.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Celular
Reviews.Author: Daruli2004
Reviews.Content: I owned a Iphone 4, so is was logic to me to buy the new generation, so I choose the Iphone 5C cause' I thought has the best relation price/value. Right now I live abroad and travel a lot, so I need it to be unlocked so I can use it any country I go, and so far so good. I recommended to all that liked the previous version and love apple phones like me.

Reviews.Title: Exact what i expect
Reviews.Author: michi
Reviews.Content: Ok it was exact that i expect good equipment and it is not cheap it is Ok thanks every thing was ok

Reviews.Title: Very good, but plastic is not apple like
Reviews.Author: Consumer Helper
Reviews.Content: Overall the phone is excellent. The camera works so well for photos and videos.I love this phone, but the plastic really does have a cheap feel. I should have gone for 5S - but good enough.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Carmen jr
Reviews.Content: I got the 5c six months ago I like the phone i just wish I had gotten 32gbs instead of the 16gbs with all the music I've got. I love that you can sync your iPad and Mac very easily and I love the new operating system compared to ios6

Reviews.Title: iphone 5c- it's what you're used to!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: A great replacement for my iphone 4. Excellent features. As always, easy to use. Watch out for battery life! '

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Jermaine
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the 4 and this one is faster, lighter, and just as easy to use.  I'll probably get the 6 when it comes, let's be honest - keeps making things that I want to buy.

Reviews.Title: As described but with missing sim clip
Reviews.Author: Hossam El Sayad
Reviews.Content: Item brand new unopened and as described in info, the only missing item is the sim clip in both phones

Reviews.Title: Contacts
Reviews.Author: Dolores
Reviews.Content: I don't know if it was because the software wasn't updated but I was losing my contacts one by one. Other than that there isn't anything really different from the other iPhones except and bigger screen and it's thinner.

Reviews.Title: Beyond my Expectations
Reviews.Author: xWolf
Reviews.Content: It may just be me (a new iPhone user) but this phone went beyond my expectations. It's fast and quick, and simple to use! Lots of apps to choose from the App Store. Camera is phenomenal! I recommend you get this!

Reviews.Title: Best Phone!
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to say this a great price, for an even greater phone.  This is the best phone I have ever had, period!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Phone!
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to say this a great price, for an even greater phone.  This is the best phone I have ever had, period!!!

Reviews.Title: Delighted
Reviews.Author: Christine Tong
Reviews.Content: Cannot comment on specific functions, as I bought this for my granddaughter, but she is delighted with it.  However, I can confirm that the photo's she now sends are crystal clear, so, a bonus for us too.

Reviews.Title: Just what she always wanted!
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: Exactly as expected product and price.Unlocked and ready to adapt to another carrier.My daughter is very happy with her gift.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Malte Hoos
Reviews.Content: I like this phone a Lot. It is fast, it looks good and the batterie is better, too! I recommend buying this phone!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 5c(green ) love it
Reviews.Author: J SHARP
Reviews.Content: Does everything ,easy to use love ios7 cool color.used android ,blackberry came back to apple it's supreme over any other.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c
Reviews.Author: Chie Yoshimune
Reviews.Content: It was completely like a new. I am gland to have purchased it on Amazon marketplace. I love this iPhone and it is very useful.

Reviews.Title: The iphone 5c is very good
Reviews.Author: Marcela do Amaral Bregalda
Reviews.Content: The product achieved my expectations. Arrived in good conditions im very satisfied. Its similar with the 5s but cheaper. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Alviann Thompson
Reviews.Content: This phone still amazes me every time I use it. I this is worthy investment for someone who wants the apple product but cannot affort the more expensive model.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c
Reviews.Author: jennifer dzurita
Reviews.Content: This iphone came in brand new condition and the quality is perfect. So far no malfunctions or glitches. Great camera qualilty.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my old 3gs to the white 5c. I personally like the polycarb back housing better than the metal or glass, which is one of the main reasons I still had the 3gs. I feel like it is more sturdy. One of my favorite parts of iphone's is the ease of switching devices with an icloud log in. Updating all of my info from one phone to the other just takes one click!I turned the motion off of ios 7, and the only real complaint is that the white font on the screen is hard to read with my background. Otherwise, I love the phone.

Reviews.Title: Received exactly what I requested
Reviews.Author: K. Cuffy
Reviews.Content: Phone is exactly what I expected. Sleek and with the IOS7, it's speed is very good. Being unlocked, I was able to slip my SIM card in right away and use immediately.

Reviews.Title: This is a great phone
Reviews.Author: Chel "in"
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence between the 5C and 5S and I went for the 5C. The reason was because of the color and because I am a little hard on phones so I felt the build was more rugged.The 5C is not selling well and it is certainly not a cheap phone. I know the S model has a little bit more power on the camera and the different chip but the 5C meets my needs well.  Note - there are some packages on Cydia that you can download to give it the same functionality as the 5S. I'm on T-Mobile and Internet on LTE is blazingly fast, video calling works great and email and calendars are top notch. I was using a 3GS for a few years as a backup phone to my BlackBerry and now the BB is the backup. If you JB your phone, you can do a lot with it.Note - I did get a bad phone first time around - the phone and charger were way hot. Since I bought it locally I was able to exchange it within 14 days and got a new one and all is well.I am surprised at some of the bad reviews but it looks like it has to do with the sellers.PS I ordered white not blueIf you are in the US and are going to pay full price for the phone, go to Apple or your local carrier.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 5c
Reviews.Author: FI
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. My kid really likes it. No complaints yet. The new design feels good on your hand. Nice phone

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: Kenrick Attale
Reviews.Content: I receieved the i phone and it arrived in time for Chyristmas as a gift for my daughter, She is thrilled

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c
Reviews.Author: Helena
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy to shop with Amazon.com I do recommend for everyone is the best site to shop with it:)

Reviews.Title: My son loves his new phone
Reviews.Author: jessica webb
Reviews.Content: Bought as a present for my teenage son. The iphone 5C is perfect for younger people. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Christian
Reviews.Content: This phone is just amazing!Before I had a crappy android (not saying all androids are crappy) but the one I had was very. Getting My iphone 5c has just been like walking out into fresh air! No more freezing up, running slow, messing up calls like my android was doing I have had really no problems with my Iphone 5c at all.The only problem I've had is with the wifi which is a small problem and can easily be fixed by unplugging the router or retry putting password in the browser (only works when in browser)Other that that amazing phone! I hope to get the iphone 6 which it comes out.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Danilo Berrones Sares
Reviews.Content: Good smartphone, although not as cheap as I thought, but iphone is iphone, anyway I think it is better to invest in the top model

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Phone - White Is A Great Color
Reviews.Author: jaldeborgh "jaldeborgh"
Reviews.Content: This phone has exceeded my expectations.  I was worries the plastic case would make the phone seem cheap - I was wrong.  I do believe the plastic case is more likely to scratch than the 5S a good quality cover will solve that problem.  I do like the white color.  It looks fresh and clean.  It's a good looking phone.  I love Apple products and this is no exception.

Reviews.Title: Loved it.
Reviews.Author: Didimimo
Reviews.Content: I actually had the blue one previously given to me as an exchange for my Sony Experia z in purple and I actually loved it but the color just didn't suit my personality I ordered this phone and had some bit of delivery issues and contacted the reseller and he was very quick and helpful to respond. Which is a plus! And when the phone arrived it was in great condition and I'm in love with it. I think iPhone 5s is basically the same as this only without the finger thingy majigy which isn't quite important.I love my phone!

Reviews.Title: White iPhone 5c
Reviews.Author: Rachel .
Reviews.Content: I got this phone about a month and a half ago and i am delighted. It has been wonderful so far. It runs smoothly, i have a hundred or so songs, 40+ apps, 200+ photos and still have 7GB free. 16GB is really not as little as you think. It's fast, much faster than my old phone. However on data it's not really as good as it could be, but that's most likely because of my company. However i would recommend this phone to anyone. Plus, the polycarbonate is not cheap, it is very well put on and i have not had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Works just as described
Reviews.Author: Kerri T
Reviews.Content: The phone is great and works just as described. It seems like it was originally for Verizon or something but once you put a t mobile card in there it works great. No problems. great phone. Love it!!

Reviews.Title: product fit my expectation
Reviews.Author: mirco
Reviews.Content: product fit my expectationi got it on timepackage was goodproduct is goodi am satisfied as usual

Reviews.Title: very good.
Reviews.Author: Mauricio de Barros Faria
Reviews.Content: I choose a iphone 5C due to its performance that I heard it was very good.in fact, it achieved my expectations and recomend to anyone to buy an iphone 5C

Reviews.Title: Superb upgrade from iphone 4,
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Weir
Reviews.Content: Having been a little apprehensive and timid about getting into the iphone world, I was a little worried when I bought the iphone 4 in July 2013. I thought a basic phone would be sufficient to meet my needs. I was so wrong about my regular phone when I stepped into the wonderful world of Apple iphones. Was I ever surprised! I was very happy with my iphone 4. I even bought a girl I was dating an iphone 4. After awhile I had enough of the iphone 4 and it's slow performance. I know that sounds spoiled,  but I needed something better and faster to really enjoy the iphone experience.  So in January of this year, I bought an iphone 5c in white. I sold my iphone 4 to the local Verizon store for a hundred dollars of store credit. With that I was able to make my purchase of my new phone.I have been very pleased with my iphone 5c. I can seemingly install numerous apps for my cell phone pleasure, as we ell as have hardly any dropped calls. I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone who wants to upgrade from the iphone 4 or lower, or to anyone who just wants a nice colorful phone which can be a conversation piece to friends and strangers alike.

Reviews.Title: Best thing I want
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It cheaper than china. So buying things is perfect in amazon I buy it for my friend,he like is so much .it same as iPhone 5c

Reviews.Title: Good phone BUT REQUIRES A REAL APPLE CHARGER
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: I just got a 5c to replace a 5.I have several non apple chargers with lightning connectors and all word with my 5 and ipad ever with the iOS 7 upgrade and warnings.My iPhone 5c ONLY charges with the genuine Apple charger and cables.So, I have to buy more Apple chargers AND extension cords since the real apple cords are all only 3' long.APPLE - I am SO DISAPPOINTED IN THIS BS,

Reviews.Title: Apple is the best...
Reviews.Author: Curtis G. Edwards
Reviews.Content: Don't care what you say, Apple is the way to go. My little sister saved up and bought this version. She loves it. It is what it says it is. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked iphone
Reviews.Author: Judith Pearson
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about ordering the iphone - that is a lot of money.  It has been perfect - just as advertised.  I am more than pleased.

Reviews.Title: Pink is great, really great!! (masculine pink)
Reviews.Author: MekoRush
Reviews.Content: well I think it's a masculine pink lol.... Ok now on to the phone. Now before i had the 5c i was going from phone to phone and trying to get off the apple bandwagon so I went n got a htc one then ended back up with a iphone 5, then the newer iphone 5s/5c was announced with ios 7 so I was wowed and I was just use to the easy menu the iphones have, especially how your emails are all synced together as if it was one email address. So I got rid of my iphone 5 traded that for a galaxy s4 active!! i had the phone for a month and used it in the shower lol. after being wowed by that I kinda grew away from the phone espcially with all the air features that's easy to activate when driving. So I got rid of the active and traded that for the Pink 5C. Now this color is great the black is a good color I think guys and girls can rock this color(well guys with the black casing for the phone lol) so yeah it's been over a month with the 5c and I don't have any urges to try out the note 3 or even the 5S. Oh wait, one thing I have to point out is I drop the phone last week :-( and it freaking failed on the top left corner and what do you know it had a big dent in the corner so this plastic is cheap cheap. and yes that was the day i put the 5C in a case. ok that's the end of my story/review

Reviews.Title: too expensive !
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: Has no expandable memory and non-replaceable battery lasts little ... too bad because otherwise it's a product cured even if unreasonably expensive compared with other devices at the same price...Apple service ( very good ) it' nt enought to sell a product with 100-150$ materials cost at theese prices !

Reviews.Title: unfortunately
Reviews.Author: Ramon Millan Lezama
Reviews.Content: excellent buy, but unfortunately my phone never came to my hands, it was stolen in the customs of my country, I could never enjoy, I lost my $ 544.99, that unfortunate

Reviews.Title: Apple products are not user friendly!
Reviews.Author: NICOLAS
Reviews.Content: Apple products are just not user friendly. They are not intuitive, but rather frustrating. I come from an android phone which was pretty simple to use, they are intuitive, if you are looking for something, you just tap where you think it could be and there it is. But iPhone, iCloud, iTunes, etc, are just a pain, there aren't enough options, it takes sometimes hours to fix a problem. I always wanted to have an iPhone, I thought to myself, "Apple MUST be better," but honestly after 5 months of struggling with this device I am convinced I made the worst mistake of my life. It's weird but I just can't wait for this thing to breakdown so I can go get me a phone with android.

Reviews.Title: Wow, very nice!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis Estevez
Reviews.Content: very good product I am totally pleased with the team, widely recommend this seller as it is super helpful with aus reasponsable and sales!

Reviews.Title: 21st birthday present
Reviews.Author: northerngirl
Reviews.Content: Made our son very happy.  Arrived quickly, tight packaging (no waste!), and looks and works great.  While not inexpensive, much less so than had we bought it from Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Apple keeps improving
Reviews.Author: Lasala Horacio Fabian
Reviews.Content: It is better that the 4s. The plastic case doesn't lo ok cheap at all. It is fast and the táctile screen improved a lot. I recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!!
Reviews.Author: Claudio Moreira
Reviews.Content: It was expected but I love this phone....  recommend is very good.I had problems with amazon password, no memory, so my delay in qualifying purchases.I repeat is an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: Phone cover case
Reviews.Author: Judy C. Mink
Reviews.Content: Because the phone is easily scratched up to make customers happy you should include a phone cover case with it I got the phone for my husband and he says it's easily scratched up

Reviews.Title: It was pink not blue lol but I knew about it that's why I bought it for my girlfriend
Reviews.Author: Edilberto V.
Reviews.Content: Very nice product I love it my girl is so happy cuz the person who sold me the iphone include some extra cases and it give me the actual box with everything in it sometimes you buy stuff on the net and u don't get all

Reviews.Content: I simply love it! everything on the phone. The looking, the speed, the iOS.Works In Venezuela. I cut the sim card from my ex iPhone 4 by myself and it works perfectly on the iPhone 5C for Movistar.

Reviews.Author: Santiago Rodriguez Almenara
Reviews.Content: I simply love it! everything on the phone. The looking, the speed, the iOS.Works In Venezuela. I cut the sim card from my ex iPhone 4 by myself and it works perfectly on the iPhone 5C for Movistar.

Reviews.Title: excellent device
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Latorre
Reviews.Content: Works as expected in a simple and confiable way.Lightweight device and fast in doing the tasks.The interface has clear and big enought icons and characters that can be read easily.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Derek B.
Reviews.Content: This phone is AWESOME!!!!!!! I get great bars ever were and it it toldly worth all the money. This is my first iPhone and I love it my dad has the 4 and it is super slow compared to this

Reviews.Title: Dropped from second story of apartment
Reviews.Author: edward haley
Reviews.Content: Plastic only got a small ding. Best iPhone yet, for durability. Gotta get otter box for super hero strength. Yeah buddy!

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Mercedes Rondon
Reviews.Content: a good phone i hope nothing goes wrong with it .. i hear some people having problems with it ,,thank you

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c Blue
Reviews.Author: Eric F.
Reviews.Content: Great phone! I have had this phone for just over a month now and so far it's been leaps an bounds over my iPhone 4! The screen size is perfect, not too huge an bulky like other android smartphones but just right for a 4in screen!

Reviews.Title: iphone5c  is exellent cellphone .
Reviews.Author: Willson L.
Reviews.Content: iphone5c  is exellent cellphone. easy to use,sensitive smoohy touth, high speed,abandant application,outstanding experience  of custome, it deserve the No.1 brand in cellphone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone..
Reviews.Author: Virginia Maidana
Reviews.Content: Loved the phone, it met my expectations. The only problem I had was with the delivery schedule, I almost loose the phone because of that.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5c
Reviews.Author: walter gwyn
Reviews.Content: Seller advertised the iPhone 5c as "BRAND NEW IN BOX WITH ALL SEALED ACCESSORIES ";  however, the iPhone I received was NOT sealed in the box because there was no seal wrap on the box indicating it had been already opened.  The iPhone appeared to be new and is working without any issues and for that I gave a rating of 4...not "sealed" as advertised.  Everything else appeared to be in order.  It arrived within the time frame promised.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: It is almost new I like it. I wish it has a good quality forever. But anyway,thanks for this good price.

Reviews.Title: Let me be clear, I love Apple but....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My family is what I would consider an Apple family, we have three Apple computers, two iPads, countless iPods, and have always and I mean always, used the iPhone. On top of that, we have all heartily recommended Apple products to friends and family. I love Apple and vowed to not touch an Android phone with a ten foot pole, ever. In fact, I used to shake my head at those poor Android phone users because I figured they can't possibly know what they are missing.  When my sister switched to Android, I actually felt personally slighted.As soon as I could, I got the 5c and I was so excited to explore all the new features it had to offer. Despite endless ribbing from me about how sorry she will be, my wife shocked me by deciding to switch and upgraded to an Android phone at the same time because she said she was tired of the same old, same old. Since she had 14 days to return it if she didn't like it, she felt like it was worth a shot. To my absolute surprise(and horror!), I found myself playing with her phone endlessly on day one while mine sat virtually untouched. I was streaming on her phone in beautiful HD on a crisp, bright, larger screen and loving it. What I had always assumed would be a clunky interface, was smooth and slick.Ok, I told myself, enough horsing around, time to enjoy mine because after all, I love iPhones and Android phones are stupid. First impression, I like the feel of the 4c. It has a solid, feel despite how some people feel about the plastic housing. The screen is bright and crisp. It's fast and doesn't hog the battery. It's like owning a completely new phone, no wait, it's not. With a slightly, and I mean slightly bigger screen and some upgrades, it is just like the iPhone I upgraded from. Not that fun.Now here is where Apple lovers will swoop in to "defend" Apple as though they have some vested interest in the company. Even as an Apple lover myself, I don't understand this. I notice that any review that does not extol the iPhone in all it's glory causes people to freak out. Really? Why spend your precious time defending any company or their products for them? I admit I know what it is like when someone says they don't care for an Apple product. It almost feels personal, almost. But to blast someone for their opinion is just plain dumb. Apple will not call you and personally thank you. They don't care. Surely you have something better to do with your time. If you like your phone, great! But everyone is entitled to their opinion. And the fact that I almost feel shame giving the iPhone a less than five star rating tells you that Apple products are a huge part of my life. But, I will not just blindly love a product just because I love the company. I don't owe any company my complete devotion or my dollars and I would be embarrassed and saddened if I did. Regardless, I am sure my review will be picked apart by fanboys as soon as it is posted. I'll say it again, this is just my opinion folks. If you like the 5c, then by all means get it and love it. I just wanted to post an opinion from someone who loves Apple and yet, isn't crazy about this phone.That being said however, if you love the iPhone usability and are used to it, you will find much of the same here. That is what nearly made me keep mine. And Siri is a pretty neat feature too. It is a solid little phone and you probably won't hate it, especially if you already like the iPhone. But there isn't much new here.The thing is, at one time, the iPhone broke new ground. The first time I laid eyes on one, I practically fainted because it was so freaking cool. There is no question that the iPhone paved the way for every phone that has followed since and in my opinion, Apple keeps setting the benchmarks that cause other tech companies to have to scramble just to catch up. Unfortunately, this phone offers little innovation and while it is a solid little number, it is getting tired. I am looking forward to the next iPhone because it sounds like there will be a lot of changes. I am almost positive I will be frothing at the mouth to switch back to iPhone in the future if what I have read is true. And I hope it is. For now though, I returned my 5c and got an Android phone(I never, ever thought I would be typing that sentence!!!). I love my new phone and for the next two years I will stick with it. But we will see where Apple goes from here. In the meantime, I will continue to enjoy my Apple computers, iPads, and iPods because wow, they are all flawless. Thanks for reading!

Reviews.Title: The pink was neon!
Reviews.Author: HLW
Reviews.Content: The picture fooled me- I thought the pink was a nice regular color, so I ordered it online. When I went to pick it up, I was horrified! The pink was very neon.  I returned it right away and got the white.

Reviews.Title: watch it
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I would watch who you order from i want to buy one so im looking everywhere for the best deal. I found on the apple site a factory unlocked iphone 5c 16 gb for $549. Keep in mind it was brand new...

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Godwin Mindra
Reviews.Content: As expected and thank-you! will come to buy again. It is a very good product and easy to use. Cheers

Reviews.Title: A Great Improvement: Judging from the Specs
Reviews.Author: daveam
Reviews.Content: Alright, First of all, I'm a HUGE Apple fan and I love all their products and usually buy them by preodering. This one, I have preordered as well, and i'm going to judge this as an average consumer with the Specifications that Apple has provided:Pros:-Wayy cheaper: $99 with 2 year contract-A lot more Colorful: The New iPhone 5c comes in 5 colors: Green, Blue, Yellow, Red, WhiteA LOT more durable: For those you guys that drop you iPhone a lot, this thing isn't going to break as fast as the Iphone 4, 4s, or even iPhone 5. It contains Metal reinforcements inside the outer Shell.- IOS 7: Alright, this is one of the biggest improvements that Apple has made, the new IOS 7 looks a lot more professional than the previous version, They have included a lot more apps that come inbuilt and gives the iPhone 5c a new look overall- Wallpaper: Apple has now integrated what they have been doing with their iPod nanos, which is to give the same colored background as the device which does make the phone look a lot more cooler-A6 Chip: This means that The iPhone 5c is going to have better battery life, namely, 10 hours LTE browsing time, 10 hours Talk Time, and 10 hours Video Playback TimeCons:I can not think of any considering this is only an improvement from the previous models BUT: Know that there is a iPhone 5s that is coming out too, so if you want to be top notch, you might want to look into that

Reviews.Title: Bad experience
Reviews.Author: Goodasgyal
Reviews.Content: I need to buy my phones online but this one was just a bad experience. I got the phone but invisible shield on it because I always protect my investment and when I turn it on to make a call the mall and charger speaker in the headset was vibrating. I thought it was just me before I had set the phone up and then put the invisible shield on but after the whole entire thing was just awful. I returned it the following day I didn't even wait or hesitated I went into a Best Buy mobile store and just walk and purchase the phone right away and make sure it works so I guess it's good for my felt something inside the store.

Reviews.Title: Apple the best !
Reviews.Author: felixdahousecat
Reviews.Content: This product is very nice product from Belkin !!!WONDERFUL PRODUCT !!! PERFECT !!!! Buy without any confidence !!!Apple is the best.... Everybody knows !!!!

Reviews.Title: You cannot go wrong with iPhone
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: Apple and the iPhone offer the cleanest yet most engaging and intuitive smartphone interface, period. Your daily communication becomes a desirable experience you can't wait to go through every day. For $100+ less than the iPhone 5s, this phone is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: apple discontinued these
Reviews.Author: Caitlyn Johnson
Reviews.Content: i see what everyone is saying here and i get that its highly priced for a cheap looking phone. good news is that apple thought the same thing. apple cut off all ties they had with the company that makes the iphone 5c's so the are no longer being made. thats why i got the iphone 5s, and im in love with it. i got it for 200 with a contract. the only thing i dont like is that the only thing thats really different about it is the outside look, its slimmer and the fingerprint scanning for unlocking the phone. but even then i love it!with all that being said, yes, you may be spending a little more because of the apple name, but Apple is a HUGE company, their devices are more high advanced than a lot of other phones in the world. look how far we have come since the little flip phone with no internet, apps, camara, video, and everything else!!

Reviews.Title: A Great Improvement: Judging from Specs
Reviews.Author: daveam
Reviews.Content: Alright, First of all, I'm a HUGE Apple fan and I love all their products and usually buy them by preodering. This one, I have preordered as well, and i'm going to judge this as an average consumer with the Specifications that Apple has provided:Pros:-Wayy cheaper: $99 with 2 year contract-A lot more Colorful: The New iPhone 5c comes in 5 colors: Green, Blue, Yellow, Red, WhiteA LOT more durable: For those you guys that drop you iPhone a lot, this thing isn't going to break as fast as the Iphone 4, 4s, or even iPhone 5. It contains Metal reinforcements inside the outer Shell.- IOS 7: Alright, this is one of the biggest improvements that Apple has made, the new IOS 7 looks a lot more professional than the previous version, They have included a lot more apps that come inbuilt and gives the iPhone 5c a new look overall- Wallpaper: Apple has now integrated what they have been doing with their iPod nanos, which is to give the same colored background as the device which does make the phone look a lot more cooler-A6 Chip: This means that The iPhone 5c is going to have better battery life, namely, 10 hours LTE browsing time, 10 hours Talk Time, and 10 hours Video Playback TimeCons:I can not think of any considering this is only an improvement from the previous models BUT: Know that there is a iPhone 5s that is coming out too, so if you want to be top notch, you might want to look into that

Reviews.Title: cost
Reviews.Author: anthony
Reviews.Content: I am not writing this review because of the phone. I am writing it because of the cost. On amazon the phone is 500 dollars but if you go to a regular apple store you can get it from 99-200 dollars. It is sad for me to see that people are spending 500 even though they can spend 200 for a new one.

Reviews.Title: No longer an apple fanatic.
Reviews.Author: Fabio
Reviews.Content: After using this phone for a few days i kinda realized something, i got ripped off. Why? because i was so blinded by the apple logo over all these years that recently i started doing some research and figured out that they are ripping people off with this price. If you compare the specs of this phone to other phones that cost the same or less you will soon realize that they are ripping you off, what you are buying is just the apple brand, nothing else, this is just a regular phone that looks just like the other iphones and really have little improvements.Keep in mind that if this phone cost $100 instead of $500 i would be giving it 5 or 4 stars. My comparisons i have made over the last few weeks is that for the price this phone sells for its really a rip off, do your research guys!

Reviews.Title: Nothing new except bad stuff
Reviews.Author: Erik R. Johnsen
Reviews.Content: Much better phones are available for the money. Nothing revolutionary except Apple knocking 50 bucks off the price and using cheaper production methods, if you call that progress. I feel sorry for people who think Apple has a grasp on the future. iOS7 also looks a bunch like windows 98 in my opinion. Don't tell an Apple fan that, they will flip out. Safari feels slower than ever, animations lag. It feels cheap, it looks cheap, total bust.

Reviews.Title: Its not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: super cheap looking crap. Iphone 4 is better than this. Its not worth even $400, They might send $150 to produce this.

Reviews.Title: Simply truth
Reviews.Author: Sergio Mauricio espalda Perdomo
Reviews.Content: For this amount of money you can purchase A better phone , and with the extra money you can buy more usefull stuffs. Just my opinion .

Reviews.Content: This is the phone of the generation!i recently purchased this for my family (my 2 yr. old, my grandma, my self, my dad , and my dog( who is blind) )There are a lot of celebrities who have this phone, here is a list :MetallicaLinkin ParkDaughtryLed ZepplinAerosmithSkrillexLed ZepplinAc-DcDriversThe BeatlesDr.DreAnd i think Aerosmith.Thank You so muchI purchased this for Hanakuah.and i was so happy!

Reviews.Title: It looks like the iPhone 2
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: Why are people so obsessed with this phone? It's beyond hideous .. I disagree with the $$$$$ ... This is my own opinion

Reviews.Title: This is selling illegal crap
Reviews.Author: Warnermcivitts
Reviews.Content: The DMCA says that unlocking these iPhones made  after January 26 2013  is illegal!!!  What ever amazon is selling that says unlocked that was made after January 26 2013 is illegal.! My advice to you is don't buy anything that says  unlocked that is nearly new!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
4-inch Retina display
A6 chip
8MP iSight camera and 1080p HD video recording
FaceTime HD camera
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20 and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 5c, White 16GB (Unlocked)
